text: Ossaea is a genus of flowering plants in the family Melastomataceae. There are about 90 species distributed from Mexico to South America and the Caribbean.Goldenberg, R., & Reginato, M. (2009). New species of Behuria, Miconia, and Ossaea (Melastomataceae) from eastern Brazil. The Journal of the Torrey Botanical Society, 293-301. Species include: * Ossaea boekei * Ossaea incerta * Ossaea palenquensis * Ossaea sparrei ==References== Category:Melastomataceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ossaea
